rev.desc.rev.desc: $File was being set up but was not being cleaned up. This caused issues with variables stepping on one another.
Added expression to the cleanup panel: cleanup($File)
added code to evaluate pre javascript, post expressions and post javascript
Updated to prevent blank fileds from overwriting data.
Modified to use scmessage for no link found message

Modified move.fields to use $L.MF.replace with CAU when updating contacts. New feature allows the user to indicate if data should replace already existing data similar to $L.file.replace in the Link Utility.
Modified move.fields panel so the correct project fields woud be used.
This app will move fields from the target file to the source file via a given link.

descript.descript: $File was being set up but was not being cleaned up. This caused issues with variables stepping on one another.
Added expression to the cleanup panel: cleanup($File)
added code to evaluate pre javascript, post expressions and post javascript
Updated to prevent blank fileds from overwriting data.
Modified to use scmessage for no link found message

Modified move.fields to use $L.MF.replace with CAU when updating contacts. New feature allows the user to indicate if data should replace already existing data similar to $L.file.replace in the Link Utility.
Modified move.fields panel so the correct project fields woud be used.
This app will move fields from the target file to the source file via a given link.
